Texts.Eng: Gather or Grow ^orange;5 potatoes^reset; and return to ^green;Welchie^reset;.

Hi there! I've not seen another new soul besides that ^green;slug-lookin' feller^reset; in a long time. If yer fixin' to escape this world, I kin help a bit, maybe. Bring me say...^orange;5 potatoes^reset;, and we'll talk. A ^orange;Greenhouse^reset; might help you make some, in a pinch.
